languages.text: Спустя считанные дни сплетник схвачен, а его язык преподносят Вольному Торговцу на серебряном блюде. Отличившийся дом теперь бдительно следит за высказываниями в адрес влады{mf|ки|чицы} протектората.

Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.
languages.original_text: Спустя считанные дни сплетник схвачен, а его язык преподносят Вольному Торговцу на серебряном блюде. Отличившийся дом теперь бдительно следит за высказываниями в адрес влады{mf|ки|чицы} протектората.

traits.locale_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.
The nobles, awed by your stoicism, quickly stop paying attention to this slander.

Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

languages.text: Quelques jours plus tard, le fauteur de troubles est capturé et sa langue offerte {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} sur un plateau d'argent. La noble maison à qui l'on doit d'avoir réglé le problème guette désormais la moindre rumeur touchant de près ou de loin {mf|le souverain|la souveraine} du protectorat.
languages.original_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Quelques jours plus tard, le fauteur de troubles est capturé et sa langue offerte {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} sur un plateau d'argent. La noble maison à qui l'on doit d'avoir réglé le problème guette désormais la moindre rumeur touchant de près ou de loin {mf|le souverain|la souveraine} du protectorat.

languages.text: わずか数日後、問題の発端となった人物が捕まり、その舌は銀の皿に載せて自由開拓者に差し出された。この問題を解決してくれた貴族は現在、保護領の統治者について言及するあらゆる発言に監視の目を光らせている。
languages.original_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: わずか数日後、問題の発端となった人物が捕まり、その舌は銀の皿に載せて自由開拓者に差し出された。この問題を解決してくれた貴族は現在、保護領の統治者について言及するあらゆる発言に監視の目を光らせている。

languages.text: 没过几天，惹麻烦的家伙就被抓住了。罪魁祸首的舌头被切了下来，放在银质的盘子上，端到行商浪人面前。解决这个问题有功的贵族家族得到了提拔，获权监管整个王朝一切涉及统治者的相关言论。
languages.original_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 没过几天，惹麻烦的家伙就被抓住了。罪魁祸首的舌头被切了下来，放在银质的盘子上，端到行商浪人面前。解决这个问题有功的贵族家族得到了提拔，获权监管整个王朝一切涉及统治者的相关言论。

languages.text: Unos pocos días después, el alborotador es capturado y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente recibe su lengua en una bandeja de plata. La casa noble responsable de la captura ahora vigila cualquier comentario relacionado con quien gobierna el protectorado.
languages.original_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Unos pocos días después, el alborotador es capturado y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente recibe su lengua en una bandeja de plata. La casa noble responsable de la captura ahora vigila cualquier comentario relacionado con quien gobierna el protectorado.

languages.text: Schon wenige später wird der Unruhestifter geschnappt und {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} wird seine Zunge auf einem Silbertablett überreicht. Das Adelshaus, dem das zu verdanken ist, überwacht nun sämtliche Bemerkungen über {mf|den Herrscher|die Herrscherin} des Protektorats.
languages.original_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Schon wenige später wird der Unruhestifter geschnappt und {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} wird seine Zunge auf einem Silbertablett überreicht. Das Adelshaus, dem das zu verdanken ist, überwacht nun sämtliche Bemerkungen über {mf|den Herrscher|die Herrscherin} des Protektorats.

languages.text: Baş belası, çok geçmeden yakalanıyor ve dili gümüş bir tepside Hür Tacir'e sunuluyor. Bu meseleyi çözen soylu hane, artık protektora hükümdarı hakkında edilen her bir kelimenin bekçiliğini yapmaya başlıyor.
languages.original_text: Only a few days later, the troublemaker is caught and their tongue presented to the Rogue Trader on a silver platter. The noble house that is to be thanked for resolving the matter now monitors any and all remarks mentioning the ruler of the protectorate.
